alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 26 at 8:51PM CDT until October 28 at 10:45AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Black River at Black River Falls affecting Jackson County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black River at Black River Falls. * WHEN...Until late Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 51.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 43.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:00 PM CDT Thursday was 55.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening and continue falling to 38.2 feet Thursday, November 02. - Flood stage is 47.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 50.9 feet on 06/02/2000. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 1100 AM CDT.
